loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es: Ana, tiene 33 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. Ella siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, lleva 3 años de haber establecido una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica como arroz, carnes, refrescos, manteca, condimentos, productos de aseo, pan, churros, huevos y otros abarrotes. Con el fin de aumentar inventario con variedad de productos y sus ventas, ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras para surtir su negocio de mas productos como carnes, refrescos, arroz, frijoles, huevos, pan, café, sal, condimentos, churros y otros abarrotes. En el futuro piensa tener su negocio mas grande y tener estabilidad económica con su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 33 years old. She is married with two children and lives in a small village in the municipality of Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. She has always worked in sales, and three years ago she set up a corner store where she sells everyday products such as rice, meat, sodas, butter, condiments, cleaning products, bread, churros, eggs and other groceries. In an attempt to increase her inventory and sales with a variety of products, she has decided to request a loan of 15,000 Lempiras to stock her business with more products such as meats, sodas, rice, beans, eggs, bread, coffee, salt, condiments, churros and other groceries. In the future, Ana plans to have a larger business and to achieve financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to stock her business with a variety of groceries.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Don Juan de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz desde hace mas de 30 años, inicio su trabajo con capital propio, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícola como fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y si poder tener una buena cosecha y darle 	a u familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Don Juan is 54 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and son. He is a farmer who grows corn. He has been doing this for over 30 years. He started his business with his own money, and sells his products in the areas surrounding the neighborhood where he lives. Juan is requesting a loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, compost, pesticides, herbicides, etc. He hopes to have a good harvest and to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, compost, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Nirivola

texts.fr:
Nirivola est une femme ayant de l’esprit créatif et de perfectionnement professionnel. Comme activité génératrice de revenu, elle confectionne des pochettes et des sacs dames  très à la mode, jolis et très classes et ceci depuis 2004. C'est une femme qui cherche toujours de l'innovation dans l'exercice de son activité. Elle ne cesse pas de créer de nouveau modèle. Elle est passionnée de ce qu'elle fait et  très impliquée. Son objectif est de pouvoir ouvrir un atelier ou une petite entreprise, créer des emplois et surtout exporter ses exploits.  
Nirivola a 37 ans, elle est mariée et son mari l'appui dans son activité, ils y travaillent heureusement ensemble. Elle a deux enfants de 5 et 2 ans et ce sont eux qui la motive à travailler infatigablement
texts.en:
Nirivola is a creative woman who is a professional perfectionist.  She has been earning her living making and selling women's handbags since 2004.  Her bags are attractive, high-class and fashionable.

Nirivola is passionate about her craft and is always looking to be innovative in her business so she constantly introduces new models.  She would like to open her own workshop, employ others and move into the export market.

Nirivola is 37 years old and works happily with her husband.  Together, they have two children who are five and two years old.  It is her children who motivate Nirivola to work so hard.

loans.use: to buy leather, cardboard, sponge, fastenings, glue, etc for her bag making business.

loans.name: Patricia Irène

texts.fr:
Patricia Irène est une femme courageuse et travailleuse de 35 ans. Elle est divorcée, avec cinq enfants à sa charge. Son mari l'a quitté depuis la naissance de leur cinquième enfant qui a maintenant 4 ans et ne lui versait aucune pension. Donc, elle élève seule ses enfants et assume seule les responsabilités.
Elle est couturière de formation, elle commençait à pratiquer ses acquis depuis 2011. Elle n'est jamais découragé à améliorer et à faire développer son activité car c'est son seul moyen de faire surmonter la vie de la famille. Elle s'efforce toujours à faire de son mieux, à lutter et à avancer.
Son objectif est toujours  d'aller de l'avant pour avoir la force de continuer, d'offrir une meilleur condition de vie et une meilleur éducation à ses enfants malgré la situation.
Sa fille ainée l'aide actuellement dans l'exercice de son activité et elle va utiliser le prêt à acheter une machine à coudre industrielle.
texts.en:
Patricia Irène is a courageous, 35-year-old woman.  She is divorced and responsible for five children.  Her husband left her following the birth of their fifth child who is now four years old.  He does not provide any financial support for her or their children, so she is solely responsible for providing for them all.

Patricia Irène is a trained seamstress and began working in this trade in 2011.  She never becomes discouraged by difficulties and works hard to develop her business which is the only source of income for her family.  She is continually striving to offer a better standard of living and a good education for her children despite their situation.  Her eldest daughter now works with her in her business.  Patricia Irène's loan will be used to buy an industrial grade sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy an industrial quality sewing machine.

loans.name: Veenem Hommes Group

texts.fr:
Mr TANGA DANIEL est responsable du groupe VEENEM HOMMES. Marié, il est père de 07enfants. Le plus âgé a 35ans et le moins âgé a 15ans. 04 vont à l'école et il a 07personnes en charge.
Mr fait l'agriculture et l'élevage depuis 45ans. Il s'approvisionne chez les agents de l'agriculture et dans les marchés et yard.
Il veut s'acheter 02 bœufs et 04 sacs de son de maïs pour nourrir les bœufs.
Avec ses bénéfice, il veut payer la scolarité de ses enfants, s'occuper des besoins de la famille et renforcer  son activité. Elle ambitionne s'acheter une parcelle et pouvoir éviter la honte en subvenant ses besoins vu qu'il est âgé.
texts.en:
Tanga Daniel is the representative of the 'Veenem Hommes' Group.  He is married and father to seven children.  The eldest is thirty-five years old and the youngest is fifteen years old.  Four of his children attend school and he is responsible for a total of seven people.

Tanga Daniel has been working in agriculture for forty-five years and buys his animals and equipment from agricultural agents and at the market.  He would like to buy two cows and four sacks of maize bran to feed them.  He will use his profit to pay for schooling for his children, provide for his family and expand his business.  His dream is to buy a plot of land and avoid the shame of being dependant on others given his age.

loans.use: to buy 2 cows and 4 sacks of maize bran to feed his cows.

loans.name: Nantenaina

texts.fr:
Nantenaina est marié et père de trois enfants dont deux d'entre eux vont actuellement à l'école.
Avant 2011, l'activité génératrice de revenu de Nantenaina était fabrication et vente de pâte de nem et gestion de gargote. Mais depuis cette année,il a décidé d’accéder dans le secteur agricole, il a démarré une activité d'élevage porcin.La raison est d'avoir plusieurs sources de revenu pour prévoir le futur. Il trouve que les deux activités sont complémentaires: le gargote et l'élevage porcin.Les restes du premier peuvent servir de compléments de nourritures des porcs. C'est un homme débrouillard et travailleur.En plus, les deux époux sont très solidaires  surtout quand il s'agit de la recherche du bien-être de la famille. Ils savent s'entraider mutuellement. Leur but est d'offrir une condition de vie meilleur à ses enfants et particulièrement une meilleur éducation pour préparer un bon avenir.
texts.en:
Nantenaina is married and father to three children, two of whom currently attend school.  Before 2011, he earned a living by making and selling nems in his small restaurant.  Since then he has moved into agriculture and started raising pigs.  He is trying to expand his range of money earning ventures to secure the future of his family.  He believes that raising pigs and running a restaurant are complementary activities and he can use the waste from the restaurant to feed the pigs. 

Nantenaina is a hard-working, self-reliant man.  He and his wife work well together and are strongly united in their desire to improve the well-being of their family.

The couple's goal is to improve the living conditions of their children and offer them a better education for the future.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his pig raising business.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en:
Rachael is a single woman with two kids, both of whom attend school. She lives in a rented house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are rent and food.

Rachael operates a grocery vegetable-selling stall. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces the challenge of high transportation costs to her place of operation. 

With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale

loans.name: Dora Del Carmen

texts.es: Dora de 43 años de edad vive casa propia con sus cinco hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas cuenta con 7 años de experiencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un cuarto y cambiando el techo en el lugar que muestra la fotografía pero no teniendo suficiente capital esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de laminas, arena, cemento, hierro, ladrillos entre otros materiales para poder tener una mejor vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Dora, 43, lives in her own home with her five children. To earn a living she makes and sells 'tortillas'. She has been doing this for seven years and she uses the the money she earns to pay the household expenses.

She would like to improve her home by building a bedroom and repairing the roof shown in the photograph. However, she does not have enough money to do this. This is why she is asking for a loan to buy corrugated metal sheets, sand, cement, iron, and bricks, as well as other building materials to be able to have a more dignified home.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: José Santana

texts.es:
José tiene 53 años de edad, tiene muchos años de experiencia en la agricultura y ganadería, vive con su familia que está formada por su esposa y sus tres hijos, el creció con sus padres quienes se dedicaban a la agricultura como principal fuente de ingresos y fue ahí donde adquirió experiencia y conocimientos sobre esta actividad que hoy en día se ha convertido en el medio para satisfacer las necesidades  su familia.


José tiene experiencia de muchos años en agricultura ya que trabajó con su padre desde que era un niño, hoy en día es su principal fuente de ingresos y es su hijo mayor quien le ayuda en las actividades que realiza.


Este préstamo le servirá a José para para pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde sembrará sus cultivos agrícolas, también comprará fertilizantes y semilla mejorada. De esta manera mejorará sus cosechas y garantizará la alimentación de su familia.

Las proyecciones que tiene para un futuro son apoyar en la educación de sus hijos y realizar siembra de hortalizas.
texts.en:
Jose, 53, has many years' experience working in agriculture and raising livestock. He lives with his wife and three children. He grew up with his parents whose main source of income was agriculture. Therefore, he gained a lot of experience and knowledge in this area helping his father when he was little.  He has put this into practice himself so that nowadays, it also serves as his main source of income to allow him to look after his family. His eldest son helps him at work.

This loan will enable Jose to pay the rent on his land where he sows his seeds. He will also buy fertilizers and better seeds. In this way he can obtain a better harvest and make sure he has enough to feed his family.

In the future, he would like to support his children in their education and grow more vegetables.

loans.use: to pay the rent on the land he uses and to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Kosar

texts.en:
Kosar is a happily married woman. 

Some years ago, she decided to support her family by starting a tailoring business at her home, as her husband's income was barely enough to meet their day-to-day expenses. Kosar is well-known in her area for her skill in stitching. However, due to a shortage of raw materials, she is facing a difficulty in meeting the daily expenses related to her business. 

Therefore she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000. With the requested loan, she wants to purchase stitching materials such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers and cloth to be able to stitch up more dresses on time and generate a healthy income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase stitching materials such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers and cloth to be able to stitch up more dresses on time and generate a healthy income for her family.

loans.name: Uvaldo Encarnacion

texts.es: Uvaldo de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz, también trabaja como jornalero en una finca, tiene 10 años de experiencia en las siembras, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Uvaldo is 32 years old and lives in a privately-owned house with his partner. Uvaldo has ten years’ experience working in farming. He mainly grows corn but also works as a labourer at a farm. Uvaldo sells his products in the surrounding areas. He is applying for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments and more and thus continue with his work in order to enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, manure, anti-disease treatments and more.

loans.name: Maritza De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maritza de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz y a la crianza de ganado, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y así continuar con sus cultivos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maritza, 42, lives in her own home with her family. She grows corn and raises livestock.

She is asking for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, compost, pest control, etc. This will allow her to continue to produce good crops so she can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pest control.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
El socio Adrian se sigue dedicando al negocio de bazar y tambien el socio vende artesania,el socio por medio de estos dos pequeños negocios quiere sacar adelante a su familia.El socio solicita el credito para comprar adornos,regalos y peluches.

El socio se siente agradecido  por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Adrian continues to work at his market stall and selling handicrafts. Through these small businesses, Adrian wants to help his family to move forward. Adrian is applying for a loan in order to buy decorations, gifts, and soft toys.

Adrian is grateful for this loan and promises to make his repayments.

loans.use: to buy decorations, gifts, and soft toys.

loans.name: Dora Angelica

texts.es:
La socia Dora Angelica se sigue dedicando al negocio de brosteria, la socia es una mujer luchadora que por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar pollo y papas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Dora Angelica is a member of the group who still sells roast chicken. She is a hard-working woman who, thanks to this business, has been able to raise her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients so she can cook chicken and chips.

She is very grateful for the loans and she promises to pay off her installments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make her roast chicken dishes.

loans.name: Manuel Concepcion

texts.es:
El socio  Manuel Concepcion se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, el socio hace platos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño del socio es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.

El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Manuel Concepcion is still dedicates his time to selling food. He uses this business to get along in life.

He makes dishes such as roast chicken, soup and other things.

His dream is to expand his business.

He is asking for a loan to buy vegetables, chicken and meat.

He is very grateful for the loan and he promises to pay off his installments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de brosteria,el socio por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante  asu familia,el sueño del socio es ampliar le negocio de brosteria. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar papas y verduras.

 El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower continues working at his breaded-chicken business, through which he wants to help his family to move forward. The borrower’s dream is to expand his business. He is applying for a loan in order to buy potatoes and vegetables.

The borrower is grateful for this loan and promises to make his repayments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes and vegetables.

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es:
Martha tiene 43 años de edad, logró estudiar  hasta tercer  grado ya  que  las  condiciones  en las   que  vivía  su familia  no le permitió tener  más  acceso a la a  educación, está  acompañada y tiene  2  hijos  que  están estudiando básica y bachillerato.

Martha tiene  3 años  de  dedicarse  al comercio informal, ella vende productos  de  belleza  y también medicinas  naturales, decidió dedicarse a esto por la necesidad de obtener ingresos para el hogar y ayudar a su esposo con los gastos.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar lociones, cremas, polvos y más medicina natural para poder continuar con su negocio.

Ella anhela con que  sus  hijos  puedan  tener  el acceso  a la  educación y prepararlos para que en el  futuro  sean personas  de  bien y sean independientes.
texts.en:
Martha is 43 years old and only has a third-grade education owing to her family’s living conditions. Martha has a partner and two children who are in primary and high school.

Martha has had an informal business for three years. She sells beauty products and natural medicines. She decided to do this work as she needed to earn an income for her home and to help her husband cover household costs.

Martha is applying for this so as to buy lotions, creams, powders and natural medicines in order to continue with her business.

Martha dreams of her children having an education and receiving the training so that they can be good people, and independent.

loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, powders and natural medicines in order to continue with her business.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a married woman and has three kids who attend school. Her husband is a policeman and together they own a house that has electricity and piped water. 

Irene has been operating a tailoring business for the past three years. Her potential clients are ladies and gents. She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future. 

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase cloth, materials and sewing threads for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth, materials and sewing threads for her business.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra is a 57-year-old married lady who has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To fully stock her store, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR which she will use to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates, in order to make more stock available for her customers. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. 

Azra wishes to use part of her revenue to provide a good quality of life for her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates, in order to make more stock available for her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more stock of meat to sell, in order to serve more customers and make more profit to support his family.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. They live at their own house that has electricity and piped water. 

For the past five years, she has been operating a food stall business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the KES 40,000, she wants to purchase 3 bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.
 
Sofia dreams of establishing a hotel in the future.

loans.use: to purchase 3 bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: Maria es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la cultivo de 4 mz. de maíz tiene 20 años de dedicarse a esa actividad que le ha ayuda a poder salir adelante con su familia, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plaga, etc. y asi poder cosechar un buen cultivo para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Maria is a single mother who lives in her own house with her son.  For 20 years she has been growing corn to support her family.  She is requesting a loan to buy farm supplies such as fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, etc. to obtain a good harvest and optimum profits.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies such as fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, etc.

loans.name: Mauricio De Jesus

texts.es: Mauricio es un hombre de 43 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de platos típicos y el cultivo de la tierra desde hace 20 años, por lo que se siente muy feliz de poder contar con este beneficio. Mauricio vive en casa de su propiedad desde hace varios años, junto a sus dos hijos de 13 y 8 años de edad, a los que está sacando adelante apoyado en su negocio y cultivo. Mauricio desea invertir más en su negocio de platos típicos, ya que cada día son más los clientes que solicitan sus productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: papas, plátanos, harina de maíz, aceite, etc.
texts.en:
Mauricio, 43, has been selling typical foods from his area and growing crops for 20 years.  He is very pleased to enjoy the benefits of his activities.  He lives in his own house, where he has been for several years, with his two children, ages 13 and 8.  He supports them through his business and crop activity.

Mauricio wants to invest in his food business because he has more and more customers every day.  He is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy potatoes, bananas, corn flour, oil, etc.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, bananas, corn flour, oil, etc.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor es un hombre de 29 años de edad, casado, tiene un hijo varón de 1 año y una hija mujer de 3 años, y su negocio es la confección de trajes de varón y trajes de mujer.
Él es buen padre, emprendedor, constante, independiente, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘23 de marzo’ el ingreso a este sector que colinda con la ciudad, es por una puerta verde donde inician las llamadas “mil gradas” es la conexión de esta zona con la urbe. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-14 grados centígrados.
Victor es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica al mismo negocio. Viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas natural y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la confección de trajes de varón y centros para polleras de cholita. Los trajes de varón son hechos a medida y están compuestos de pantalón, chaleco y saco. Los centros son también llamados ‘enaguas’ y son utilizados por mujeres de vestir tradicional debajo de la pollera para cubrir del frío, “inicié desde muy joven en mi labor, ahora trabajo junto a mi esposa que también confecciona, nuestra meta es confeccionar trajes artesanales para los bailarines de la entrada del carnaval de Oruro...” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas las realiza por mayor a grupos de 30 bailarines hombres como mujeres, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de cortes de tela por mayor. Su sueño es ampliar su taller de costura, él desea realizar la compra de cortes de tela por mayor para confeccionar trajes de varón a grupos de bailarines. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que desarrolla esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Victor solicita un préstamo para la compra de cortes de tela por mayor para confeccionar trajes de varón a grupos de bailarines y vender por mayor.
texts.en:
Victor, 29, is married and has a one-year-old son and a three-year-old daughter. He has a clothes-making business, where he makes suits for men and dresses for women.

He is a good father and an entrepreneur. He is reliable, independent, responsible and very hard-working.

He runs his business from the entrance to the '23 de marzo' area, which lies next to the city El Alto. Here, this green gate of the 'mil gradas' connects this area to the city. The climate is cold and dry and the temperature is between 2 and 14°C.

Victor is dark-skinned, has brown eyes and short black hair. He is short and well-built. His mother tongue is Aymara which he speaks with his family and he also speaks Spanish in his culture. Spanish is also the language he uses in business.

He lives with his wife who also works in the same thing. They live in a house which belongs to the family. It is made of bricks and has a corrugated metal roof and a wooden floor. It has a fresh water supply, electricity, gas and a drain system.

To earn a living he makes men's suits and the inner part of a traditional Bolivian skirts. He makes the men's suits to measure, and they are made up of pants, a waistcoat and a jacket. The inner part of the skirts are called 'enaguas' and are used in the traditional dress to go under the skirts to protect against the cold.

He started in this line of work when he was very young and now he works together with his wife. Their aim is to make traditional dresses for the dancers who are involved in the Carnival in Oruro. 

The main benefit of this business is that he can sell to a group of 30 dancers, both men and women. The disadvantage he faces is that he does not have enough money to buy the cloth wholesale.

His dream is to expand his workshop. He would like to buy the cloth wholesale so he can make the suits for the dancers.

This is the first set of loans he has asked for in the three years he has been working independently. He is asking for a loan to buy cloth wholesale so he can make the dancers' suits and sell them wholesale.

loans.use: t's o buy supplies for making clothes which he can sell wholesale.

loans.name: Elsy Del Carmen

texts.es: Elsy de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de atoles y con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo de su casa pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de láminas, polines, y pago de mano de obra y asi tener una vivienda digan para una mejor comodidad.
texts.en:
Elsy, 38, lives in her home with husband to children. She makes and sells traditional drinks called 'atoles'. She uses profits the pay some of the household expenses.

He would like to improve her home by changing the roof, but the money she earns from her work is not enough to be able to do it. This is why she is asking for a loan to buy corrugated metal sheets, beams, and pay labor costs so she can have a more dignified home and live in more comfort.

loans.use: to buy building material and paylabor expenses.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Kalsoom is a 39-year-old married woman and a mother of 7 children. 

She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing this for many years and she knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue operations of her business, she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR  to buy stitching materials such as spools of threads in different colors, packs of zippers and buttons, etc. to be able to sew more dresses on time. 

In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenue to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stitching materials such as spools of threads in different colors, packs of zippers and buttons, etc. to sew more dresses on time

loans.name: Kaneez

texts.en:
Kaneez is a 44-year-old married woman with 4 children. 

She is very skilled in the art of hand embroidery, and she has been using this skill for many years to earn a living. She can make beautiful designs and patterns with her hands, and her skill is known throughout the town. 

She has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR. This loan will enable her to purchase more beads, threads and frames to meet her customers' orders on time and earn a good amount of profit. 

This financial help will take Kaneez closer to her dream of providing quality education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more beads, threads and frames to be able to meet her customers' orders on time

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn wholesale.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
Rita tiene 44 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive  con su madre,  su hermana y sobrinas.

Rita se dedica  a la  venta de pupusas desde  hace  varios  años,   en esta actividad  se  involucra su hermana y  una  sobrina, esta venta la realiza dos veces a la semana y tiene que viajar a otra ciudad a comprar los ingredientes, tiene muchos clientes que llegan a comprar por encargos y otros que les gusta comer las pupusas en el local.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar sillas,  mesas, maíz, chicharrón, quesillo, frijoles, aceite, etc pues son elementos necesarios para su negocio.

Ella sueña con que su negocio sea más rentable, contar siempre con la ayuda de su hermana y sobrina y darle una mejor imagen al local para volverlo atractivo para atraer más clientes.
texts.en:
Rita, 44, is single and does not have any children. She lives with her mother, her sister and her nieces.

She sells 'pupusas', a business she has been doing for several years. Her sister and her niece help her. They sell their products twice a week and they have to travel to another city to buy the ingredients.

They have a lot of customers who buy food to take away and others who like to eat in their place.

She needs a loan to buy chairs, tables, corn, pork rind, cheese, beans, oil, etc so that she has what she needs for her business.

She dreams of making the business more profitable. She would also like to be able to count on her sister and niece's help and be able to improve the image of her place in so that it attracts more customers..

loans.use: to buy restaurant supplies and ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy spare parts to repair and service his motorcycle, so he can keep it in good condition and serve more customers

loans.name: Grisselda Del Carmen

texts.es:
Grisselda de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, está acompañada y tiene 3 hijos de los cuales solo dos están estudiando.

Grisselda se dedica al comercio informal, ella  vende  golosinas y refrescos a los niños que  asisten a la  escuela, tiene  6 meses  de  haber  comenzado en este negocio, anteriormente hacía tamales  para vender y también aprendió a  hornear  pan  dulce, esto lo aprendió por la necesidad de salir adelante con su familia y para aportar a los gastos del hogar.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar golosinas, refrescos, dulces, etc para surtir su tienda.

Ella sueña con seguir luchando para poder darle  el estudio hasta  donde  pueda  a sus hijos ya que  ella  no tuvo la oportunidad de culminarlos.
texts.en:
Grisselda, 28, has a fourth grade education and lives with her partner and three school-aged children.

She is a merchant and sells sweets and soft drinks to school children, having started the business six months although she used to make and sell tamales.  She also learned to make pastry to help support the family and earn extra income.

The loan she is requesting is to buy sweets and soft drinks for her store.  Grisselda's goal is to continue working so she can give her children the education she was unable to receive.

loans.use: To buy sweets, soft drinks, etc. for her store.

loans.name: Tolotrarisoa Raymonde

texts.fr:
Tolotrarisoa Raymonde est une femme mariée. Son mari est chauffeur. Elle a deux enfants dont le premier va actuellement à l'école.
Pour aider son mari à soutenir la famille, elle exploite un commerce de détail depuis 2012. Son épi-gargote est localisé à côté d'une entreprise de zone franche qui emploie approximativement plus de 500 personnes. Donc ses clients fondamentaux sont les employés de ladite entreprise. Presque les 90% de ces derniers déjeunent du lundi au samedi dans son gargote. C'est une grande opportunité pour son affaire.
Son objectif est d'agrandir le local pou pouvoir recevoir plus de clients.  Le but du prêt est surtout pour renforcer le fonds de roulement utilisé dans le gargote.
texts.en: Tolotrarisoa Raymonde is a married woman, whose husband is a driver. She has two children, the elder of whom currently attends school. She has been running a retail business since 2012 in order to help her husband to support their family. Her grocery store/café lies next to a company in a tax-free zone, which employs more than 500 people. Her main customers are thus the employees of this company. Almost 90% of them eat their lunch in her café from Monday to Friday, and this is a great opportunity for her business. Her aim is to expand her premises so she can welcome more customers and this loan will be used above all to boost her working capital in the café.

loans.use: to buy sacs of rice, some liters of table oil and dried fish.

loans.name: Charité

texts.fr: Charité, âgée de 42 ans est mariée et a deux enfants. Elle vend au détail des produits alimentaires. Charité souscrit un microcrédit, pour diversifier son activité. A coté des sacs de riz et de haricots qu’elle vend actuellement, elle compte ajouter un stand d’épices et d’autres produits pour la cuisine.
texts.en: 42-year-old Charité is a married mother to two children. She runs a retail business where she sells food products. Charité is taking out a loan in order to diversify her activity. Alongside the bags of rice and beans which she currently sells, she plans on including a spice stand and other cooking products.

loans.use: to purchase spices and other cooking products

loans.name: Luis Enrrique

texts.es: Luis de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, el posee un taller de carpintería tiene 20 años de experiencia en la actividad, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes pero como no tiene suficiente capital esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra y asi poder tener una mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Luis, 38, owns a house where he lives with his mother. He has a carpenter’s workshop and twenty years of experience with this activity. With the money he makes from sales he manages to cover some of the home expenses.

He wants to improve his home by plastering the walls. However, he lacks the money, so he is requesting a loan to buy cement and sand, and to pay for the labor, in order to have a better house.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand, and pay for the labor needed to plaster the walls.

loans.name: Voahirana Hary Lalao

texts.fr:
Voahirana Hary Lalao est une femme travailleuse , âgée de 42 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants qui sont tous actuellement scolarisés.
Elle est une artisane très douée et minutieuse.Elle fabrique des paniers en raphia et ceci depuis 1994. L'objectif de sa demande d'emprunt est de développer son activité. Actuellement, elle fait des ventes ambulantes, elle se déplace dans différents marchés  des villes et villages environnantes pour vendre les produits et elle voudrait exporter ses œuvres. Elle est encours de recherche des clients à l'étranger.
Elle espère un jour pouvoir construire une autre maison même si elle est déjà propriétaire de la maison où elle habite  maintenant.
texts.en: Voahirana Hary Lalao is a hard-working woman who is 42 years old. She is married and mother to three children, who are all currently at school. She is a very gifted and meticulous artisan. She makes baskets out of raffia and has been doing this since 1994. She is requesting a loan so she can build up her business. For the present, she sells her goods on foot, going to markets in different towns and villages in the surrounding area. She would like to export her goods and is in the process of looking for customers abroad. She hopes that one day she will be able to build another house, even though she is already the owner of the house where she lives now.

loans.use: to buy raffia, baskets and leather.

loans.name: Ernestine

texts.fr:
Ernestine est une femme battante et fonceuse âgée de 37 ans. Son mari l'a laissé seule avec leurs deux petits enfants de cinq ans et de trois mois. Il l'a quitté il y a maintenant environ un an, c'est à dire quand elle était enceinte de deux mois seulement de leur deuxième bébé, sans lui verser  aucune pension.
Face à cette situation, elle dit qu'elle doit continuer seule à lutter et elle n'est jamais découragée. Ses deux enfants la motive vivement à avancer sans plaindre.
Heureusement qu'elle avait déjà exercé une activité génératrice de revenu, même avant son mariage. Elle exploite une activité de vente de sac de voyage, sacs dame et cartables de différents modèles depuis 2007. Le prêt va lui permettre de développer cette activité.
De plus son désire est de pouvoir agrandir la maison pour que l'habitation et la boutique se séparent  et que tous les trois pourront vivre confortablement.
texts.en:
37-year-old Ernestine is hard-working and dynamic. Her husband left her with their two young children, aged five years and three months ago. He left her around a year ago, when she was just two months pregnant with their second child, without leaving her any financial support. Faced with this situation, she decided that she needed to continue on alone and she has never lost her drive. Her two children motivate her to carry on without complaining.

Luckily, she had already been running her own money generating business before her marriage. She has been selling various models of travel suitcases, women's handbags and satchels since 2007. This loan will allow her to further develop this business. Her dream is to be able to expand her house so that her home area and her shop are separate. This way, all three family members will be able to live comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase satchels, women's handbags and travel suitcases

loans.name: Hilda Patricia

texts.es: Hilda de 33 años estuvo influenciada por amigos para que se incorporar en la vida comercial por intermedio de catálogos especializados que ofrecen productos a la moda y de buena calidad, ella aceptó el reto y hace tres años su vida cambio positivamente al genera ingresos para su familia. Ella es madre de un niño de ocho años a quien dedica el tiempo y necesario para su formación, esta labor también le permite estar al tanto de las labores en el hogar. Para realizar esta labor está disponible todo los días a partir de las 10 a.m. hasta las 10 p.m.  y realizar las visitas a sus clientes a quienes les ofrece blusas, vestidos, pantalones, jeans, faldas, calzado y accesorios.  Al ofréceles facilidad de pago a sus clientes y tener un escaso capital, ella aplicó a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para cumplir con pedidos de ropa, perfumes, calzado y accesorios. Esta inversión le permite también manejar un stock de inventario acorde a la demanda de sus clientes.  Sus metas a futuro son que su negocio sea más rentable y continuar con la educación de su hijo.
texts.en:
Hilda, 33, was motivated by her friends to start selling products from specialized catalogues offering fashionable, good-quality products. She accepted the challenge and her life changed for the better three years ago, since she started to receive an income for her family.

She is the mother of an eight-year-old son. She shares with him all the time he needs to grow up. Her job allows her to take care of the household chores. She works every day from 10:00 am until 10:00 pm. She visits her customers and offers them blouses, dresses, pants, jeans, skirts, shoes and accessories.

She applied for a CrediKiva because she offers her customers special credit terms and lacks enough capital to fulfill all her orders of clothes, perfumes, shoes and accessories. This is her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. This investment will help her to keep her stock levels in good shape and respond to the customers’ demands. Her long term goals are to have a more profitable business and make sure her son stays in school.

loans.use: to buy clothes, perfumes, shoes and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rye grass or shrubs and to pay for land rent and workers' salaries

loans.name: Buajar

texts.ru: Буажар успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы. На участке мерою 1,0 Га арендованной и 0,50 Га собственной земли она выращивает клевер. Ежемесячный доход составляет 14,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своей деятельности, Буажар обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, семян для посадки и выращивания экологически чистых арбузов. Доходы от кредита Буажар планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Buajar successfully repaid her loan, having used it for its intended purpose. She is grateful to Kiva Fund and to everyone who helped to finance her. Now she has two cows. She grows clover on a 1.0 hectare plot of rented and 0.5 plot of her own land. Her monthly income is 14,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Buajar has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer and seeds to sow and cultivate organic watermelon. Buajar plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further growth of her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seeds to sow and cultivate organic watermelon.

loans.name: José Napoleon

texts.es:
Napoleón, de 79 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, es viudo, su esposa falleció hace 16 años, uno de sus hijos estaba muy pequeño, actualmente solo vive con sus dos hijos.
 
Napoleón, tiene un molino desde hace 21 años, en su comunidad existía la necesidad de poner un molino, ya que en la zona no habían, fue así como decidió colocarlo y desde entonces el molino ha sido su única fuente de ingresos y eso le ha servido mucho, ya que con esos ingresos ayudo a su hijo para que estudiará, el molino lo tiene en su casa y el horario de atención es desde las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 9: a.m. y por la tarde de 3:00 p.m. a 5:00 p.m. en estas dos jornadas le ayudan sus hijos.

Napoleón, necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, ya que este año pretende cultivar con la ayuda de su hijo.
Los sueños que tiene Napoleón, son seguir trabajando en el molino y dejarle algo de herencia a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José Napoleón is 78 years old and has a third grade education. He is a widower since his wife died sixteen years ago, leaving him to care for one child who was still very young at the time. José Napoleón now lives with his two children. 

José Napoleón has been operating a grain mill for 21 years. He found out that the area where he lives did not have a mill at the time. Since then, his grain mill has been a source of income that has helped one child with getting an education and graduating from high school. His mill is located in his home and is in operation in the mornings from 7:00 A.M. to 9:00 A.M. and in the afternoons from 3:00 P.M. to 5:00 P.M. During these two shifts, José has the help of his children. 

Now he needs a loan to buy fertiliser as this year he is planning to grow crops with the help of his son.

His dreams are to continue his work at the mill so that his children can inherit it one day.

loans.use: buy fertiliser

loans.name: Claudia Fidelia

texts.es:
Claudia de 41 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato y sus 3 se encuentran estudiando.

Claudia vende tortillas y siembra maíz con sus hijos, el negocio lo aprendió con su madre ya que ella se dedicaba a lo mismo para mantener la familia, la venta de tortillas la tiene en su casa y la parcela donde siembra está en la misma colonia donde vive.

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar maíz.

Claudia desea abrir una peluquería ya que anteriormente recibió cursos de dicha actividad.
texts.en:
Claudia is 41 years old and she studied up to high school level. Her three children attend school.

Claudia sells tortillas and grows maize with the help of her children. She learned the business from her mother who also earned her living this way to support the family. She sells tortillas from her house, and the land where she grows maize is located in the same area where she lives.

The loan is needed to buy agricultural supplies for the maize crop. 

She wishes to open a hair dressing salon one day as she once took training in this field.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies for her maize crop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy cement, corrugated sheeting, beams, steel, sand and bricks, and pay for workers to construct a hallway in her house

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es:
La socia Lorenza se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes y tambien la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de cereales como tarwi,trigo y maiz, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lorenza is a member who sells groceries, and cereals such as tarwi, wheat and corn. She sells essential products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies. She works from 08:00 am until 07:00 pm. She has been in business for five years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her business.

This member is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies. Receiving this loan makes her feel happy and she promises to pay the installments according to plan.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

loans.name: Zuhran

texts.en:
Zuhran is a 36-year-old married woman who has had an animal purchasing and selling business with the help of her husband (also shown in the photo) for many years. Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is a mother of four children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing. 

Zuhran has requested a loan of 35,000 PKR. She intends to utilize this loan to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers. She is hopeful that her business will generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Shameem

texts.en: Shameem is a 52-year-old married woman. She deals in selling animals. She buys baby goats and calves at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at a higher price. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate extra income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted the Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: María Ana Julia

texts.es:
María de 55 años de edad, no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar, sus padres no la mandaron  a la escuela porque pensaban que era innecesario, ahora está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 7  hijos y ya todos están acompañados.

Ella se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años, oficio que aprendió con sus padres, se dedicó a
este negocio porque era la forma más viable para obtener ingresos económicos, el lugar donde cultiva está a 20 minutos de su casa y se va a pie de su hogar.

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar 9 sacos de fertilizantes, preparar la tierra y pagar el arrendamiento.

Su sueño es tener una casa de ladrillo y espera lograrlo con trabajo y dedicación.
texts.en:
María, 55 years old, did not have the opportunity to go to school. Her parents didn't send her to school because they believed it wasn't necessary. Now she is partnered and her partner works in agriculture. She has 7 children and they are all now partnered. 

She has worked in agriculture since she was 15 years old, a job she learned with her parents. She works in this business because it was the most viable way to get income. The place she cultivates is 20 minutes from her house and she goes by foot from her home.

This loan is necessary to purchase 9 sacks of fertilizers, prepare the land, and pay the rent.

Her dream is to have a brick house and she hopes to manage it with work and dedication.

loans.use: to purchase 9 sacks of fertilizers, prepare the land and pay rent.

loans.name: Carlos Remberto

texts.es:
Carlos pudo estudiar hasta 9 grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica  a los oficios domésticos, tiene una hija y vive en casa de su madre.


Carlos siempre se ha dedicado  a la siembra y compra de granos básicos, aprendió esta actividad de su madre, la parcela donde siembra se encuentra a 20 minutos de su casa y se va a pie, a pesar de no haber tenido la oportunidad de prepararse académicamente ha demostrado ser un joven trabajador.


Él  necesita este crédito para comprar ganado y después venderlo para sacar ganancias.

Él sueña con tener un negocio fuerte de ganadería.
texts.en:
Carlos was able to study up to the 9th grade. He is partnered and his partner takes care of the household tasks. He has a daughter and lives in his mother's house.

Carlos has always worked growing and purchasing basic grains. He learned this work from his mother. The land where he plants is located 20 minutes from his house and he gets there by food. Despite not having the opportunity to get an education, he has shown himself to be a hard-working young man.

He needs the loan to purchase livestock and later to sell them to get income.

He dreams of having a strong livestock business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and later sell them to get income.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Wilfredo, de 46 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos, uno de ellos está estudiando y el otro está trabajando con él.

Wilfredo, se dedica  a la agricultura desde hace 21 años, el decidió apartarse y formar su propia familia y trabajar en la agricultura, pues fue herencia de su papá.- Pero Wilfredo, también trabaja en su casa con un molino, ya que en la zona son pocos molinos los que hay y la demanda es muy alta; por otra parte, los cultivos los tiene a 35 minutos de su casa y lo hace solamente con ayudantes, ya que su esposa se queda moliendo y su hijo se va a estudiar.

Wilfredo, necesita el préstamo para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde va cultivar y comprar tres sacos de abono, porque quiere cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de terreno, ya que el año anterior solo sembró 3,500 de terreno y no le fue muy bien.

Los sueños de Wilfredo, es seguir cultivando para que nunca le falte el maíz en su casa y para tener ingresos en la familia y que su hijo estudie una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Wilfredo, 46 years old, went to school up to the fourth grade. He is partnered and his partner takes care of the household chores. He has two children. One of them is in school and the other works with him.

Wilfredo has worked in agriculture for the past 21 years. He decided to go off and form his own family and work in agriculture, since it was a legacy of his father. But Wilfredo also works in his house with a mill, since in the area there are few mills, and for the ones there are, the demand is very high. The crops that he has are 35 minutes from his house, and he works it just with assistants, since his wife works the mill and his son goes to school.

Wilfredo needs the loan to pay the rent for the land where he will plant, and to purchase three sacks of manure because he wants to cultivate 7,000 square meters of land, and it didn't go very well for him. 

Wilfredo's dreams are to continue growing his crops so that he never lacks corn in his house, and to have income in the family so his son can study in a university program.

loans.use: to pay the rent for the land where he will plant, and to purchase three sacks of manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, and metal to build her home.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Manuel  de 25 años de edad, estudió hasta 9 grado, aún no se ha casado y vive en casa de sus padres. 


Manuel de dedica a la siembra maíz y frijol, ha realizado esto toda su vida desde muy pequeño, la actividad la aprendió con su padre cuando lo llevaba al campo, la parcela donde cultiva está a 30 minutos de su casa y se va a pie.

Él utilizará el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar maíz.

Él siempre ha soñado con comprar un pickup para hacer viajes particulares y así generar otra fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 25 years old. He went to school up to the 9th grade. He hasn't married yet and he lives in his parents' house.

Manuel grows corn and beans. He has done this his whole life since he was small. He learned the activity from his father when he would take him to the fields. The land he grows on is 30 minutes from his house and he walks there. 

He will use the loan to buy agricultural materials to plant corn. He has always dreamed of buying a pickup to offer transportation and thus generate another source of income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials to plant corn.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un pequeño productor de café de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en su pequeña finca de 2.1 hectáreas de café, la cual maneja bajo los criterios de certificación comercio justo.

En los últimos años, este productor ha logrado en promedio una cosecha de aproximadamente 90 quintales de café pergamino, lo cual para este año ha tomado como un reto, proponiéndose incrementar este rendimiento productivo y alcanzar una cosecha de al menos 120 quintales.  Para esto, requiere un financiamiento que le permita asegurar la compra de insumos y fertilizantes, que contribuirá a asegurar la demanda nutricional de su plantación.

La inversión que realice Carlos en su finca, se sumará al esfuerzo y trabajo que él y su familia vienen realizando en su finca para mejorar sus ingresos y con ello las condiciones económicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is a small coffee producer in the northern zone of Nicaragua. He lives with his wife and their three children on a small farm of 2.1 hectares of coffee, which he manages under the fair trade certification criteria. 

In recent years, this producer has managed to have a harvest of an average of approximately 90 quintals [approximately 9,000 pounds] of parchment coffee, which this year has been a challenge. He proposes to increase this level of production and achieve a harvest of at least 120 quintals [approximately 12,000 pounds]. So, he needs a loan that will allow him to make a purchase of supplies and fertilizer which will contribute to assuring the nutrition demands of his farm. 

The investment that Carlos makes in his farm will be added to the efforts and work that he and his family put into the farm to improve their income, and with that, the family's economic condition.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizers that he will apply to his coffee crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, galvanized sheeting, and rods to change the roof and put in a cement floor in his house.

loans.name: Adriana Massiel

texts.es:
Adriana es una joven visionaria, que desde muy pequeña ayudaba a todos sus vecinos de distintas formas. A sus 28 años de edad, cuenta que el haber estado en una comunidad activa, le ayudó a formarse y querer seguir ayudando a la gente mediante la odontología, fue entonces cuando sacó su título de Dentista. Ahora tras haber conseguido hace dos años un trabajo como cirujano dentista de una clínica y haber obtenido muchos conocimientos en la práctica ella decide montar su propia clínica. 
Poco a poco Adriana ha ido comprando instrumentos para su clínica, que la ubicará en un cuarto de la casa de su tía, pero que no sueña con que pronto podrá tener su propio establecimiento. Para esto primero desea invertir, por esto esta joven emprendedora solicita un préstamo para comprar una silla dental, lámpara, rayos x portátil, entre otros equipos tecnológicos para su futuro negocio. Esto le permitirá avanzar un paso más con su gran sueño de empezar su propia clínica y convertirse en un cirujano reconocido.
texts.en:
Adriana is a visionary young woman, who since she was very small helped all her neighbors in various ways. At 28 years old, she says that having been in an active community, it helped to make her who she is and to want to continue helping people through dental care. It was then that she got her dentistry degree. Now, after having gotten a job two years ago as a dental surgeon in a clinic and having gained a lot of practical knowledge, she has decided to open her own clinic. 

Little by little, Adriana has been purchasing tools for her clinic, which she will locate in a room in her aunt's house, but she doesn't dream of being able to open her own establishment soon. So, she first wants to invest, and for this, this enterprising young woman asks for a loan to purchase a dental chair, lamp, portable x-ray machine, and other technical equipment for her future business. This will allow her to advance another step with her great dream of opening her own clinic and becoming a well-known surgeon.

loans.use: to purchase a dental chair, lamps, portable x-ray machine, and other technical equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase farm tools such as jembes for ploughing his coffee farm to eliminate weeds for a better farm produce for sale in the market.

loans.name: Kache

texts.en:
Kache is a married woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that  has electricity  but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Kache operates a grocery vegetables selling stall, she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

With the Kshs 30,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes and bananas for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and bananas for resale

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a married woman and has four school going children. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food and school fees for the family.

For the past three years, she has operated a business of buying and selling livestock, selling at the market to local neighbours. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and high cost of transportation in her place of operation. 

With the loan, that she is requesting, she wants to purchase  three goats and cows for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase three goats and cows for resale.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 16000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing nets for her fishing business.

Riza has been in this business for 9 years. Riza earns more income from buy and sell charcoal.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing nets, to save for the future

loans.name: Carlos Ernesto

texts.es:
Carlos de 45 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, él creció con sus padres quienes le enseñaron estas actividades, su familia esta conformada  por su esposa quien le apoya con los oficios domésticos y sus dos hijos.

Carlos se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. junto a su esposa para ir a trabajar durante la mañana en la parcela que alquila y durante el resto del día cuida sus animales y su esposa se dedica a vender la leche  en los alrededores de su vivienda.


	Él necesita este crédito para comprar abono, semilla, veneno, etc. y pagar alquiler de la tierra para la siembra de granos básicos.

Sus planes son comprar más vacas para aumentar la producción de leche.
texts.en:
Carlos, 45 years old, works in agriculture and raising livestock. He grew up with his parents who taught him this work. His family is made up of his wife, who supports him with the household tasks, and their two children.

Carlos gets up at 4:30 am with his wife to go to work during the morning on the plot of land which he rents, and during the rest of the day he cares for his animals and his wife works selling the milk in the areas near their house. 

He needs this loan to purchase manure, seeds, poison, etc. and to pay the rent on the land to plant basic grains.

His plans are to purchase more cows to increase the milk production.

loans.use: to purchase manure, seeds, poison, etc. and pay rent on the land to plant basic grains.

loans.name: Gloria Haydee

texts.es:
Gloria de 49 años de edad, está acompañada y su pareja es motorista, tiene dos hijos que están estudiando y dependen económicamente de ella.

Gloria trabaja como profesor desde hace 20 años, siendo esta su mayor fuente de ingresos pues se esforzó estudiando para obtener una buena carrera, su trabajo está a 40 minutos de su casa y viaja en bus, su horario es de 7.00 am a 4.30 pm.


Ella necesita este crédito para cancelar unas deudas pendientes.

Sus sueños son darles a sus hijos el estudio para que puedan defenderse en un futuro y seguir trabajando con esta institución.
texts.en:
Gloria, 49 years old, is partnered and her partner is a driver. She has two children who are students and depend on her economically.

Gloria has worked as a teacher for the past 20 years, and this is her major source of income since she studied hard to get a good career. Her work is 40 minutes from her home and she travels by bus. Her schedule is 7:00 am to 4:30 pm.  

She needs this loan to pay off debts.

Her dreams are to give her children an education so they can take care of themselves in the future, and to continue working in this school.

loans.use: to pay off debts.

loans.name: Lara 50155 Group

texts.en:
Samira is the featured borrower of Lara 50155 group, she joined with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, because they have always been neighbors and friends, and they work hard to develop their living and businesses.

Samira is a 62-year-old married mother of one child who has been working for fifteen years in preparing mouneh (traditional pickles), to support her husband in their living needs.She is well known in her region with her special work she does and the high quality produced.
She is highly recommended by her customers and at the same time she works hard to please them.

 Her acquired loan will be invested in buying to buy necessary raw materials to increase her production and develop her business.
Samira is the first lady at the far left side of the picture, as for the other group members,Rania is the second from the left, Lara is the second from the right while Mona is the first from the right.

loans.use: To buy the necessary raw materials to increase her production of mouneh (traditional pickles) and develop her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, and metal to finish building a bedroom in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in metal sheeting, wood, nails, a breaker box, and electrical wire for the electrical connection and to replace the metal sheeting on the walls and roof of his house.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is a loveable woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1967. She is living in rural area with her chicken and turkeys. She is divorced and has a daughter. She well knows how to keep chickens and turkeys, since her childhood. After graduation of university she moved to Khujand city and lived and worked there. Then after eight years she came back to her parents’ house to continue keeping chickens and turkeys. 

After city life it was hard to her to adapt again to standards of keeping chickens and turkeys. She kept going about her activity and is happy to have it, because she loves much chickens and turkeys . She appealed to IMON and KIVA asking a loan to buy young chickens, turkeys to feed and for  breeding and also selling chicken’s egg. She takes care of her chickens and hopes to be financed to continue her activity. She awaits Kiva lenders kindness.

loans.use: to buy young chickens, turkeys to feed and for breeding, selling chicken’s eggs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open up her market by transporting bananas to other places for sale.

loans.name: Kizinga Group

texts.en:
Asha who is in her early 40s is single with two children who are grown-up.  She lives with her mother and has been selling clothes for two years now.   She works from 09am to 08pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.  

This will be Asha’s 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use this loan to buy up to date clothes to meet her customer’s demands and requests.  She dreams of owning a beauty salon.

Asha will share this loan with her loan group Kizinga which consist of two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy up to date clothes to meet her customer’s demands and requests.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit is 57 years old. She has been married over 30 years and has son. Anahit and her husband are living in the Kapan town, in Syunik region. 

A while ago, Anahit started a clothing sales business. Today, she wants to support her business and for that she needs a loan. With this loan , Anahit plans to buy more clothes for selling, increasing her monthly income and helping his family to support their lives.

Anahit wishes the best for her family , and she works hard to cover daily needs. The start-up loan program, which provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products, will greatly help Anahit to make her goals to come true.

loans.use: to pay for more clothes to sell, increasing her monthly income and helping her family to support their lives

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is from Kapan town where she works as a hairdresser. She lives with her husband, and two children.  Emma is a devoted, hardworking and talented master of her work, so she has number of customers coming to her beauty salon. 

She has now applied for this loan to pay for the renovation of a new salon and to purchase different hairdressing tools and materials. The start-up loan program, which is joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International, provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. Emma will be happy to receive lenders' support and improve her business.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of a new salon and purchase different hairdressing tools and materials

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 55 years old, married and blessed with 5 children. He has a retail business selling school bags, pairs of socks, mirrors, utensils and other retail goods and it has been profitable. He will be using the loan to buy more school bags, pens and writing materials as well as kitchen utensils and hopes this will enable him to meet his clients' demands. He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate his children. His future hopes are to open a retail shop, make more income and support his family.

loans.use: To buy more school bags, pens and writing materials as well as kitchen utensils to enable him to meet his clients' demands.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To use in constructing a better shade for use in the area to attract more customers for more income gain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a more stable stall and add more vegetables stock for resale.

loans.name: Belemnaaba Group

texts.fr:
Mme TALATO est responsable du groupe BELEMNAABA. Elle se porte bien ainsi que les autres membres du groupe. Mariée, elle est mère de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 28ans et le moins âgé a 13ans. Les 04 vont à l’école. Elle a 05personnes en charge.
Mme vend des légumes et des céréales  depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Elle veut s’acheter 05sacs de choux, 05sacs d’oignons, 02sacs de concombre et 01sac de piment.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut épargner et scolariser ses enfants. Elle ambitionne devenir grossiste.
texts.en: Mrs. Talato is in charge of the group Belemnaaba.  She is doing well as are the other group members.  Married, she is the mother of 4 children.  The oldest is 28 years old and the youngest is 13.  All four go to school.  She is responsible for 5 people. She has been selling vegetables and grains for 11 years.  She gets her supplies at surrounding markets and wants to buy 5 bags of cabbage, 5 bags of onions, 2 bags of cucumbers and 1 bag of chili pepper.  With her earnings, she wants to save up and educate her children.  Her ambition is to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of cabbage, 5 bags of onions, 2 bag of cucumbers and 1 bag of chili pepper

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 34 years a resident of Nkenge, Kyotera in Rakai district, married with 3 children 0nly two attend school. 
He is in a business of coffee trading which he started in 2010. And also he earns from transport since he has truck.

Richard works 7 days a week and 12 hours per day and started this business with the aim of improving his daily income.
Richard wants a loan of ugx4,000,000/= to buy more stocks of coffee so that he meets the demand of his customers. Richard mostly sells his coffee to rural and urban people.

He still has a challenge of limited capital to expand his business and he hopes to overcome it when the business breaks even and with continued financial support.
Richard is such a hard working man and determined.

loans.use: To boost his coffee trade business, to buy coffee wholesale for selling

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Los deseos de superación de María, son los que siempre la han motivado para salir adelante junto con su familia. A sus 56 años de edad, esta emprendedora lleva más de seis años con su pulpería, que inició con unas cuantas bolsas de arroz, frijoles y azúcar, y con la cual ahorró para comprar una camioneta y empezar a prestar el servicio de acarreo. Afortunadamente cuenta con el apoyo de sus cuatro hijos, ya independientes, y de su esposo quién trabaja en un taxi. 
María tiene unas expectativas visionarias, pues quiere seguir trabajando fuerte para que su negocio siga creciendo. Por esta razón solicita un préstamo para comprar arroz, salsas, frijoles, sopas instantáneas, papel higiénico, golosinas, entre otros productos indispensables para su pulpería. Esto le permitirá más y mejores productos a sus clientes. En sus planes está llegar a convertir su negocio en una miscelánea y a cambiar la camioneta de acarreo por una más actual.
texts.en:
María's desire to get ahead is what has always motivated her to get ahead with her family. At 56 years old, this entrepreneur has had her store for more than six years, which she started with a few bags of rice, beans, and sugar. With she saved to buy a truck and start to offer a hauling service. Fortunately, she has the help of her four children, who are grown, and her husband, who drives a taxi. 

María has visionary expectations. She wants to keep working strongly so that her business keeps growing. That is why she is asking for a loan to buy rice, sauces, beans, instant soups, toilet paper, snacks and other indispensable products for her store. This will allow her to have more and better products for her customers. Among her plans are to make her business into a variety store and change her truck for a newer one.

loans.use: to buy rice, sauces, beans, instant soup, toilet paper, snacks, and more.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro de 65 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado y ahora está casado, vive solo con su esposa pues sus hijos ya viven aparte. 

 
Pedro se dedica a la agricultura pues es un oficio que aprendió de sus padres; trabaja durante la mañana en las parcelas que posee y en la tarde realiza tareas del hogar.

	Él solicita este crédito para comprar dos novillas y en un futuro aumentar la producción de leche.

Pedro planea que con los ingresos que obtiene de venta de leche y de la siembra podrá comprar más animales.
texts.en:
Pedro is 65 years old. He went to school up to the sixth grade and now he is married. He lives alone with his wife and his children live on their own.  
 
Pedro works in agriculture. It is a trade he learned from his parents. He works during the morning on the land he owns and in the afternoon he does tasks around the home.

He is asking for this loan to buy two heifers and in the future increase milk production. 

Pedro plans on buying more animals with the income he obtains from selling the milk and from his crops.

loans.use: to buy two heifer and increase milk production.

loans.name: Mwanaidi

texts.en:
Mwanaidi is a married woman and has one kid who attends school. She lives at a rental house that  has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past five years, she has operated a poultry farming business which earns her source of income. She sells to restaurant operators and local neighbours. Her major challenges are high cost of transportation to her place of operation.

With the Ksh 20,000 she wants to  purchase chicken feeds and chicks. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards

loans.use: to  purchase chicken feeds and chicks

loans.name: Arzigul

texts.ru: Это удивительная и счастливая женщина из района Кубадиен, и ее зовут Арзигул. Она 55 летняя жена и мать детей. Арзигул живет в деревне своей районе с мужем, детьми и невесткой. Она любит домашних животных, и по этой причине, она занимается животноводством деятельностью, которое очень распространено среди жителей села. Арзигул  выращивает крупнорогатого скота много лет. Она покупает молодых телят, откармливает их в течение нескольких месяцев, прежде чем принимать их на рынок для перепродажи. Ее муж и дети помогает ей в работе. Арзигул принимает этот кредит, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота и сохранить бизнес. Животноводческая деятельность является источником дохода, и она не хочет потерять ее.
texts.en:
This wonderful, happy woman is from the Qubadiyon region and her name is Arzigul. She is a 55-year-old wife and mother who lives in the countryside with her husband, children and daughter-in-law. She loves domestic animals and for this reason works in animal husbandry, an occupation that is very common among residents of her village. She has been raising cattle for many years. She buys young calves, fattens them over several months and then takes them to the market to sell them. Her husband and children help her with the work.

Arzigul is taking out this loan so she can increase her head count of livestock and keep her business going. Animal husbandry is her source of income and she doesn't want to lose it.

loans.use: to increase her head count of livestock and keep her business going

loans.name: Norah

texts.en:
Norah is married, and has two kids who attend school. She owns a house that has neither has electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
